alert.note: Alert for Coastal Duval; Coastal Nassau; South Central Duval; Trout River; Union; Western Duval (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Freeze Warning issued January 16 at 4:56AM EST until January 17 at 9:00AM EST by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...FREEZE WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 3 AM TO 9 AM EST WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Sub-freezing temperatures as low as 27 expected. * WHERE...Union, Coastal Nassau, Coastal Duval, Trout River, South Central Duval and Western Duval Counties. * WHEN...From 3 AM to 9 AM EST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Frost and freeze conditions could kill crops and other sensitive vegetation.
info.instruction: Appropriate action should be taken to ensure tender vegetation and outdoor pets have adequate protection from the cold temperatures. Young children, the elderly and the homeless are especially vulnerable to the cold. Take measures to protect them.

area.areaDesc: Coastal Duval; Coastal Nassau; South Central Duval; Trout River; Union; Western Duval
